#summary Information about the Safari Driver
#labels WebDriver

= Safari Driver =

This driver only works with Safari 3 on OS X with Universal Access enabled, but has been tested on both Tiger and Leopard.  

To enable Universal Access, open "System Preferences", and make sure that the "Enable access for assistive devices" checkbox is ticked.

== Pros ==

 * Drives Safari. 
 * Supports Javascript

== Cons ==

 * Relatively slow
